definition: chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: This part of the backgammon board is the home.
sentences.chinese: 此部分西洋双陆棋盘是老家。

sentences.english: In the chess, the horses and generals can't fight.
sentences.chinese: 棋盘里，车无轮马无缰，叫声将军提防提防。

sentences.english: The soil was squared off like a gigantic chess-board.
sentences.chinese: 土地象大棋盘一样分成方块。

sentences.english: Bettys Beer Bar is completely addicting board game fun.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂斯啤酒酒吧是完全上瘾的棋盘游戏的乐趣。

sentences.english: "Goe" is a ballet of complementary patterns intertwining across the board.
sentences.chinese: 围棋，是一种交织在棋盘上的黑白图案形成的芭蕾。

sentences.english: Put two grains on the second square.
sentences.chinese: 在棋盘第二格放两粒米。

sentences.english: God is re-aligning the chessboard, so to speak.
sentences.chinese: 神在重新排列祂的棋盘，祂要说话。

sentences.english: He always feels like a sovereign descending to the world in front of the chess board.
sentences.chinese: 小明精通棋艺，面对棋盘他总有种君临天下的感觉。

sentences.english: On display is one of the earliest surviving chess sets, made by hand from a type of pottery in Iran in the 12th century.
sentences.chinese: 展出的则是十二世纪伊朗陶制的国际象棋棋盘。

sentences.english: The utility model is composed of a plurality of chessmen and a chessboard.
sentences.chinese: 该棋由若干粒棋子和一个棋盘组成。

sentences.english: Mathematically, the chessboard pattern has ‘colour symmetry’.
sentences.chinese: 数学上，棋盘格具有“着色对称性”。

sentences.english: The resulting bitboard contains all of the possible moves of Black's knights.
sentences.chinese: 得出的位棋盘中包含了所有可能的黑马步法。

sentences.english: The checkered pattern of that suspender recurred incessantly to his mind.
sentences.chinese: 那根背带的棋盘格花纹不停地在他脑子里显现出来。

sentences.english: The black and white chequerboard doodle suggests patience and persistence.
sentences.chinese: 黑白两色的棋盘涂鸦解释了绘画者的耐心和耐力。

sentences.english: In the chess, the horses and the generals can't fight.
sentences.chinese: 棋盘里，车无轮马无僵，叫声将军提防提防。

sentences.english: The loincloths for women come in seven different colors and two designs -- plain and chequered.
sentences.chinese: 女士裈有七种颜色以及一色和棋盘格两种款式。

definition: state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]
see 蓮花落|莲花落[lian2 hua1 lao4]
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
sand table (military)/3D terrain (or site) model (for real estate marketing, geography class etc)/sand tray (on which to write characters)
checkers (board and pieces for go 圍棋|围棋 or Chinese chess 象棋 etc)
Shitai county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
